name: src/typedef/ApiConfig.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} ApiConfig
 * @property {String} domain
 * @property {String} [urlPreviewApi]
 * @property {String} [apiKey]
 * @property {String} clientKey
 * @property {String} [clientId]
 * @property {String} [token]
 * @property {String} [privateKey]
 * @property {String} [authBase]
 * @property {Object} [events]
 * @property {function(error: Object)} [events.onAjaxError]
 */

name: src/typedef/ClientData.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} ClientData
 * @property {String} _id
 * @property {String} avatarUrl
 * @property {String} email
 * @property {String} nickname
 * @property {Object} address
 * @property {Number} address.port
 * @property {String} address.family
 * @property {String} address.address
 * @property {String} userAgent
 * @property {String} lastLoginTime
 * @property {Number} lastLoginTimeMS
 * @property {String} id
 * @property {String} publicKey 訊息加密公鑰
 */

name: src/typedef/MessageData.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} MessageData
 * @property {String} messageType
 * 'text', 'image', 'video', 'audio', 'location', 'sticker',
 * 'joinRoom', 'leaveRoom', 'addMember', 'deleteMember'
 * @property {String} message
 * @property {String} [room] room id
 * @property {String} [messageTime]
 * @property {String} [sticker]
 * @property {String} [originalUrl]
 * @property {String} [thumbnailUrl]
 * @property {Number} [width]
 * @property {Number} [height]
 * @property {Number} [latitude]
 * @property {Number} [longitude]
 * @property {String} [duration]
 * @property {String} [extra]
 * @property {MessageData} [reply]
 *
 * @property {Object} sender
 * @property {String} sender.id client id
 * @property {String} sender.avatarUrl
 * @property {String} sender.nickname
 * @property {String} sender.lastLoginTime
 * @property {Number} sender.lastLoginTimeMS
 *
 * @property {String} messageTime
 * @property {Number} messageTimeMS
 * @property {String} id message id
 * @property {String} [appID]
 * @property {Number} [__v]
 *
 */

content:

name: src/typedef/Push.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} PushPayload
 * @property {String} topic
 * @property {Number} badge
 * @property {String} sound
 * @property {String} nickname
 * @property {String} title
 * @property {String} collapseKey
 * @property {String} body
 * @property {String} icon
 * @property {String} sample-type:sample
 * @property {Object} alert
 * @property {String} alert.loc-key
 * @property {String[]} alert.loc-args
 */

name: src/typedef/RoomData.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} RoomData
 * @property {String} _id
 * @property {String} appID 房間 ID
 * @property {MessageData} lastMessage 最後一則訊息
 * @property {String} name Room name
 * @property {Number} serviceStatus
 * @property {String} createdTime ex: 2018-05-21T08:41:28.438Z
 * @property {Object[]} memberProperties 會員已讀狀態
 * @property {Number} memberProperties.badge
 * @property {String} memberProperties.lastRead
 * @property {String} memberProperties.client
 * @property {Object[]} members 會員列表
 * @property {String} members[].id
 * @property {String} members[].avatarUrl
 * @property {String} members[].nickname
 * @property {String} members[].lastLoginTime
 * @property {Number} members[].lastLoginTimeMS
 * @property {Number} members[].publicKey
 * @property {Boolean} muted 是否靜音
 * @property {Number} createdTimeMS ex: 1526892088438
 * @property {String} id 房間 ID
 * @property {String} [roomType] 房間 type, "direct" or "group"
 * @property {Boolean} [encrypted] 房間訊息是否加密
 * @property {RoomPref} [pref] 房間個人資訊
 */

name: src/typedef/RoomPref.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} RoomPref
 * @property {String[]} [tags]
 * @property {String} [folder] 房間所屬資料夾
 * @property {Boolean} [muted] 是否靜音
 * @property {Boolean} [sticky] 是否置頂
 * @property {Boolean} [hidden] 是否隱藏
 */

name: src/typedef/SocketConfig.js
content:
/**
 * When Socket Receive Message
 * @name SocketOnReceiveMessageFunction
 * @function
 * @param {MessageData} message
 */
/**
 * @typedef {Object} SocketConfig
 * @property {String} domain
 * @property {String} [clientId]
 * @property {String} [token]
 * @property {String} [privateKey]
 * @property {Object} [events]
 * @property {function(error: Object)} [events.onAjaxError]
 * @property {function()} [onConnect]
 * @property {function()} [onDisconnect]
 * @property {function(message: MessageData)} [onReceiveMessage]
 * @property {function(room: {room: String, memberProperty: {badge: Number, client: String, lastRead: String}[]})} [onReceiveRoom]
 * @property {function(typing: {message: String, room: String, sender: String})} [onReceiveTyping]
 * @property {function(data: {messageID: String, roomID: String, memberID: String})} [onReceivelastRead]
 * @property {function(data: {room: String, folder: String, hidden: Boolean, muted: Boolean, sticky: Boolean, tags: String[]})} [onReceiveRoomPref]
 * @property {function(data: Object)} [onReceiveMyPrefChange]
 * @property {function(data: String)} [onReceiveMyPrefDelete]
 */

types: function(room: {room: String, memberProperty: {badge: Number, client: String, lastRead: String}[]})

name: src/typedef/TokenData.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} TokenData
 * @property {String} [_id]
 * @property {String} token
 * @property {String} client
 * @property {String} expirationDate
 * @property {Number} expirationDateMS
 * @property {String} [id]
 */

# Imkit Js Api v3

描述描述

## Installing

### NodeJs

```sh
$ npm install --save https://github.com/imkit/imkit-js-lib
```

## Use

### NodeJs

```javascript
import { IMKitApi, IMKitSocket } from 'imkit-js-api-v3';

let api = new IMKitApi(apiConfig);
let socket = new IMKitSocket(socketConfig);
```

### CDN

```html
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/imkit/imkit-js-lib/lib/imkit-js-api-v3.web.js"></script>
```

```javascript
let api = new IMKitApi(apiConfig);
let socket = new IMKitSocket(socketConfig);
```
